anya-e0105n24:1: Kiṁ nissāya katoti etassapi pañhassa attho ācariyeneva pakāsito. Vuttañhi ettha ganthārambhe –
anya-e0105n24:7: Sabbasaṅkaradosehi, mutto yasmā pakāsito’’ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.ganthārambhakathā.
anya-e0105n24:8_0: Iminā pana vacanena ayamattho pākaṭo hoti – ‘‘visuddhimaggaṁ kurumāno ācariyo mahāvihāravāsīnaṁ
anya-e0105n24:8_1: desanānayasaṅkhātā pañcannampi nikāyānaṁ porāṇaṭṭhakathāyo nissāya tāsu vuttaṁ gahetabbaṁ
anya-e0105n24:8_2: sabbaṁ vinicchayaṁ samāharitvā akāsī’’ti. Tasmā yā yā ettha padavaṇṇanā vā vinicchayo
anya-e0105n24:8_3: vā sādhakavatthu vā dassīyati, taṁ sabbaṁ tassa tassa niddhāritapāḷipadassanikāyasaṁvaṇṇanābhūtāya
anya-e0105n24:8_4: porāṇasīhaḷaṭṭhakathāto ānetvā bhāsāparivattanavaseneva dassitanti veditabbaṁ. Ayampi
anya-e0105n24:8_5: hi visuddhimaggo na kevalaṁ attano ñāṇappabhāvena kato, visuṁ pakaraṇabhāvena ca,
anya-e0105n24:8_6: atha kho catunnampi āgamaṭṭhakathānaṁ avayavabhāveneva kato. Vuttañhi tāsaṁ nigamane –
anya-e0105n24:12: Suparimitaparicchinnaṁ, cattālīsasataṁ hotī’’tiādi dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3.nigamanakathā.
anya-e0105n24:13_0: Yā pana visuddhimagge maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhiniddese ‘‘ayaṁ tāva visuddhikathāyaṁ
anya-e0105n24:13_1: nayo. Ariyavaṁsakathāyaṁ panā’’tiādinā visuddhi. 2.717 dve kathā vuttā, tāpi mahāvihāravāsīnaṁ
anya-e0105n24:13_2: desanānaye antogadhā imassa visuddhimaggassa nissayāyevāti veditabbāti.
